thread.title: My family's stay at Ibis Budget Porte de Pantin
thread.title_full: My family's stay at Ibis Budget Porte de Pantin - Review of Ibis Budget Paris Porte de Pantin, Pantin, France - TripAdvisor

author: Liliana O
title: My family's stay at Ibis Budget Porte de Pantin
text: Non smoking rooms that reeked of smoke, leaking shower heads, cast lamps, cold water were just a few of the issues. We tryed our best to speak French most of the time, if we didn't we wouldn't be understood, most of the staff speaks only French.
